name: Applesauce
instructions: Remove the core from apples, mash the apples, add sugar and cinnamon

name: Lumberjack Breakfast
description: Nice and easy bacon and eggs for a hearty breakfast
instructions: Cook bacon on high until nice and crispy, about 10 mins. Cook eggs for about 3 minutes on each side

name: Steamed Green Beans
description: Good green beans to pair with anything
instructions: Dump green beans in a steamer and steam for 15 minutes

name: Meat Lover Omelet
description: Omelet with bacon, sausage, and pork
instructions: Crack eggs into bowl and whisk them until combined. Pour onto heated pan. As it starts to firm up add the meat.

name: Apple Pie
description: Fresh apple pie like mama used to make
instructions: I don't know how to make pie
